{"step_by_step_thinking": "According to Document [3], carbon steel is broken down into four classes based on carbon content: Low-carbon steel 0.05 to 0.25% carbon content, Medium-carbon steel Approximately 0.3–0.5% carbon content, High-carbon steel Approximately 0.6 to 1.0% carbon content, and Ultra-high-carbon steel Approximately 1.25–2.0% carbon content.
